data.name: Sweet Dreams Alex
data.detailed_description:
Become Alex’s Dream Architect

Alex is still small, but her dreams are big. You are her Dream Architect, tasked with keeping Nightmares away while she sleeps. Build labyrinths full of distractions to delay her Nightmares until the morning comes.




Sweet Dreams Alex is a wholesome puzzle and construction game, filled to the brim with atmosphere and charm. Each level presents a new challenge that you can solve in a variety of creative ways, while experiencing a cute slice-of-life story about the wonders of childhood.

Go on a journey with Alex

Alex and her family just moved into their new home. It is all still a bit much, and a bit scary, but also quite exciting. Together, they start Alex’s diary, to write down all the important new things as they happen—like getting ice cream, making friends, going to the mall, visiting the most beautiful ocean-museum and watching TV.

Explore six different worlds and over 250 levels

Discover over 250 hand-crafted puzzles split into six different worlds, each of them teeming with their own unique mechanics and storylines. Manage the dreams carefully to guide Alex through her childhood—one exciting day and one restful night at a time.


Lose Yourself in the Wonderful Music and Relaxing Atmosphere

Life is crazy. Sweet Dreams Alex is a peaceful game to take a break with. Every level, every moment is packed with a deep, relaxing atmosphere - accompanied by over 70 minutes of wonderful Lofi music by Towerz. Sweet Dreams Alex is comfort food in a challenging world.

Build and Share Your Own Levels

Included with Sweet Dreams Alex comes a comprehensive and powerful level editor that allows you to freely build and design levels as you please. Managing your levels is easy and intuitive, and sharing your levels is as simple as copying an import/export code. Let your creativity shine while crafting levels for your community!


Start Dreaming Today

Sweet Dreams Alex is a deeply immersive game for players of all ages.
Welcoming, but still challenging—spending an evening with Alex is the perfect way to slow the day down, when everything else is moving too quickly.

data.short_description: Alex is still small, but her dreams are big. You are her Dream Architect, tasked with building labyrinths full of distractions, to keep Nightmares away until the morning comes. Sweet Dreams Alex is a wholesome puzzle and construction game, filled to the brim with atmosphere and charm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX950
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.00GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.4
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX950
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.4
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.00GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
